typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		County as string,
		Year as string,
		Population as string,
		{Index Count} as string,
		{Index Rate} as string,
		{Violent Count} as string,
		{Violent Rate} as string,
		{Property Count} as string,
		{Property Rate} as string,
		{Firearm Count} as string,
		{Firearm Rate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 filter(County=='Alleghany' || County=='Broome' || County=='Bronx' || County=='Erie') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(asc(Year, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 derive(deltaColumn = Population-{Index Count}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(partitionFileNames:['testDataFlow.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
